description: This file defines a tool function 'get_top_hackernews_stories' that fetches top stories from Hacker News API, processes them, and yields JSON strings. It also initializes an Agent with specific context and tool configurations, and triggers a response print.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can execute tools and handle context, used to manage interactions and responses.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches top stories from Hacker News API, processes each story, and yields JSON strings of story data.
